name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_73Ga
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Ga" means the element "gallium" and "73Ga" is the isotope "gallium-73" with a half-life of 2.03e-01 days.
